name: The Second Chance Strip Club
description:
The Second Chance Strip Club is an experimental rhythm game featuring a talking dog called Sensei!Welcome to Ville Écarlate
Ville Écarlate is the place to be if you're looking to have a good time. Known for its bright lights and night life, it's no wonder Sensei set up shop there when he decided to leave behind his master's degree in favour of working the pole.Meet a Colourful Cast
Ville Écarlate attracts all kinds, and you'll be able see that in our entourage of fourteen playable characters. Each of which come with their own dance moves, music tracks, and biographies to tell you a bit more about the person dancing on stage.

Like Penelope, the sweet and gentle vet-in-training whose hobbies include online gaming and naps:



Or Spike, the bold and brave beach volleyball player who plans on leading his team to becoming beach volleyball world champs:

Experimental Gameplay
While most rhythm games, as the genre's name would imply, have you focusing on the rhythm of the music, The Second Chance Strip Club takes a slightly different approach.

Gameplay has you focused on just the Beats Per Minute, giving you a chance to lose yourself in the music as you play, and offering players gameplay that's incredibly easy to pick up, but incredibly hard to perfect - seriously, try getting an S Rank on all fifteen levels! And when you've finished your set, you'll be showered with gifts from your adoring fans; gifts which can be sold at the Pawn Shop to buy extravagant upgrades and more!"Will there be nudity?"
Of course!

We felt that given the subject matter, it would disingenuous to pretend there wasn't nudity involved. But, just in case you're worried this game will get you a little too hot under the collar, we've provided the ability to turn nudity on and off whenever you want via the Options.

And in case you're wondering, considering our very diverse cast, we have separate nudity options: "Bosoms and Beavers", and "Peckers and Peanuts", so rest assured, you can tailor this experience to whatever your tastes.Anything Else
Not that we can think of, so what are you waiting for? Get out there and show the world what you're made of!
